longBusinessSummary: Setco Automotive Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of clutches and other automotive component in India. The company offers brake lining, clutch, flywheel, lubricants, universal joint, and release bearing assembly products under the LIPE and Lava Cast brand names. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Gujrat Setco Clutch Limited and changed its name to Setco Automotive Limited in November 2005. Setco Automotive Limited was incorporated in 1982 and is based in Mumbai, India.
